metadata.description:
99 pages!
After the events depicted in Kade: Identity, Nieves returns home to her icy kingdom of Veserun to find it in turmoil. The death of Apollyon has sent ripples of evil throughout the world, awakening the ancient demon Malkoth, imprisoned in the ice for thousands of years. His power weakened, but still potent, Malkoth's corrupting influence forces the ice elves to free him. The only one that stands against him is Nieves!
metadata.name: Nieves
